00024 
00025 
00027 //
00028 // Based on SFML configuration header
00029 // SFML Config.hpp:
00030 // http://www.sfml-dev.org/documentation/2.0/Config_8hpp-source.htm
00031 //
00032 // Acknowledgements to Simple and Fast Multimedia Library
00033 // http://www.sfml-dev.org/
00034 //
00036 
00037 
00038 #ifndef PLUMA_CONFIG_HPP
00039 #define PLUMA_CONFIG_HPP
00040 
00041 
00043 // Identify the operating system
00045 #if defined(WIN32) || defined(_WIN32) || defined(__WIN32__)
00046 
00047     // Windows
00048     #define PLUMA_SYS_WINDOWS
00049     #ifndef WIN32_LEAN_AND_MEAN
00050         #define WIN32_LEAN_AND_MEAN
00051     #endif
00052     #ifndef NOMINMAX
00053         #define NOMINMAX
00054     #endif
00055 
00056 #elif defined(linux) || defined(__linux)
00057 
00058     // Linux
00059     #define PLUMA_SYS_LINUX
00060 
00061 #elif defined(__APPLE__) || defined(MACOSX) || defined(macintosh) || defined(Macintosh)
00062 
00063     // MacOS
00064     #define PLUMA_SYS_MACOS
00065 
00066 #elif defined(__FreeBSD__) || defined(__FreeBSD_kernel__)
00067 
00068     // FreeBSD
00069     #define PLUMA_SYS_FREEBSD
00070 
00071 #else
00072 
00073     // Unsupported system
00074     #error This operating system is not supported by this library
00075 
00076 #endif
00077 
00078 
00079 
00081 // Define library file extension based on OS
00083 #ifdef PLUMA_SYS_WINDOWS
00084      #define PLUMA_LIB_EXTENSION "dll"
00085 #elif defined(PLUMA_SYS_MACOS)
00086      #define PLUMA_LIB_EXTENSION "dylib"
00087 #elif defined(PLUMA_SYS_LINUX) || defined(PLUMA_SYS_FREEBSD)
00088      #define PLUMA_LIB_EXTENSION "so"
00089 #else
00090    // unknown library file type
00091     #error Unknown library file extension for this operating system
00092 #endif
00093 
00094 
00096 // Define portable import / export macros
00098 #if defined(PLUMA_SYS_WINDOWS)
00099 
00100     #ifndef PLUMA_STATIC
00101 
00102         // Windows platforms
00103         #ifdef PLUMA_EXPORTS
00104 
00105             // From DLL side, we must export
00106             #define PLUMA_API __declspec(dllexport)
00107 
00108         #else
00109 
00110             // From client application side, we must import
00111             #define PLUMA_API __declspec(dllimport)
00112 
00113         #endif
00114 
00115         // For Visual C++ compilers, we also need to turn off this annoying C4251 warning.
00116         // You can read lots ot different things about it, but the point is the code will
00117         // just work fine, and so the simplest way to get rid of this warning is to disable it
00118         #ifdef _MSC_VER
00119 
00120             #pragma warning(disable : 4251)
00121 
00122         #endif
00123 
00124     #else
00125 
00126         // No specific directive needed for static build
00127         #define PLUMA_API
00128 
00129     #endif
00130 
00131 #else
00132 
00133     // Other platforms don't need to define anything
00134     #define PLUMA_API
00135 
00136 #endif
00137 
00138 
00139 
00140 
00141 #endif // PLUMA_CONFIG_HPP
